node_name.C: 一个人的整体健康状况

The probability of dietary habits of an individual being healthy dietary habits of an individual (B=1) is 0.7570. 
For those with amount of exercise done by an individual being little (A=0) and dietary habits of an individual being unhealthy dietary habits of an individual (B=0), the probability of overall health status of an individual being good (C=1) is 0.7717. 
For those with amount of exercise done by an individual being little (A=0) and dietary habits of an individual being healthy dietary habits of an individual (B=1), the probability of overall health status of an individual being good (C=1) is 0.9169. 
For those with amount of exercise done by an individual being regular (A=1) and dietary habits of an individual being unhealthy dietary habits of an individual (B=0), the probability of overall health status of an individual being good (C=1) is 0.9458. 
For those with amount of exercise done by an individual being regular (A=1) and dietary habits of an individual being healthy dietary habits of an individual (B=1), the probability of overall health status of an individual being good (C=1) is 0.9828. 
For those with amount of exercise done by an individual being little (A=0) and overall health status of an individual being poor (C=0), the probability of risk of developing a chronic disease being likelihood (D=1) is 0.8127. 
For those with amount of exercise done by an individual being little (A=0) and overall health status of an individual being good (C=1), the probability of risk of developing a chronic disease being likelihood (D=1) is 0.3847. 
For those with amount of exercise done by an individual being regular (A=1) and overall health status of an individual being poor (C=0), the probability of risk of developing a chronic disease being likelihood (D=1) is 0.8258. 
For those with amount of exercise done by an individual being regular (A=1) and overall health status of an individual being good (C=1), the probability of risk of developing a chronic disease being likelihood (D=1) is 0.4058.
